as w=

hey still have value for us, even if for a few moments
longer."

ughs, "Their strengths will be added to a new servant of

is under MY control!"

(TAG: Darkfate)

Meanwhile Perceptor is easily able =
to follow the form of Skorponok.
While Perceptor has had to do much in the =
way of tunneling to keep up,
the path Skorponok has left is easy to follow.=

Skorponok m=
oved in to a rather large chamber deep beneath the earth.

xcavation has already happened, as small drone like
robots are here and the=

ponok moved over the small building and stopped. 

The door opened on the s=
ide of Skorpook as Vorpal's voice could be

toform and place him inside the
structure, but leave the Cyclonus, Scourge =
